definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159

sentences.english: He backed the bus away so that we could get into the gate.
sentences.chinese: 他將大客車倒走，使我們能進入大門。

sentences.english: We repainted the bodywork of the bus.
sentences.chinese: 我們把大客車的外部重新油漆了一遍。

sentences.english: A bus and two helicopters took terrorists and hostages on their way.
sentences.chinese: 一輛大客車和兩架直升機把恐怖分子和人質運走了。

sentences.english: The major multi-car pileup was caused by a charter bus.
sentences.chinese: 這起嚴重連環車禍是由一輛包租的大客車引起的。

sentences.english: We are anxious for the coach to come for us on time.
sentences.chinese: 我們急切希望大客車準時來接我們。

sentences.english: Under crane's assistance, the bus soars, is moved puts to the road nearby.
sentences.chinese: 在吊車的協助下，大客車騰空而起，被移放到公路旁。

sentences.english: Excursionists packed into a big bus.
sentences.chinese: 遠足的旅客們擠在一輛大客車裏。

sentences.english: The motor coach started up. The bus was about to leave.
sentences.chinese: 大客車開始啓動，就要開走了。

sentences.english: At Birmingham I transferred to another coach.
sentences.chinese: 我在伯明翰換乘另一輛大客車。

sentences.english: A three-axle bus air pressure braking system is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹三軸大客車氣壓制動系統。

sentences.english: This van should answer our purpose for transporting children to school.
sentences.chinese: 這輛大客車應該能夠解決接送孩子們上學的問題。

definition: Kanting township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
(of police etc) to stop (sb) for inspection/to pull (sb) over
to fish by casting a net/to capture/to surround and seize
Sanxing or Sanhsing township in Yilan county 宜蘭縣|宜兰县[Yi2 lan2 xian4], Taiwan
(of two vehicles traveling in opposite directions) to pass by each other
